title: AT-A-GLANCE Monthly Desk Pad Calendar 2016, Two Color, 21-1/4 x 17 Inches, Red/Black (SK1170-00)
features: Keep your calendar where you need it – right in front of you, on your desk. 12 month desk pad follows the calendar year January – December. Julian dates.
One month per page format allows clear date reference. Large, unruled daily blocks provide plenty of space for notes. Each block is 2.37 in. x 2.62 in.

Note space is included each month and a Look Ahead column provides even more additional notes space for each day of the next month. Full year, 12 month calendar reference included along the top of each page and federal holidays are highlighted in red.
Durable backboard provides sturdy writing surface on your desktop and four black poly corners ensures pages stay flat
Desk pad is printed with black and red ink on white heavyweight paper that contains 30% post-consumer weight. Page size: 22 in. x 17 in. Overall size: 21.75 in. x 17.12 in. x .06 in.
description: AT-A-GLANCE Desk Pad serves as a monthly calendar that you can keep neatly on your desktop. The 12 month calendar runs January to December with one month per page. Large, unruled blocks provide plenty of space to jot down notes and reminders of special events. Block size: 2.37 in. x 2.62 in. For future planning and fast date reference a full year calendar is printed on the top of each page. Federal holidays are noted in red. There is also ample notes space and a full Look Ahead column with a line providing additional notes space for each day of the next month. This desk pad was printed in black and red ink on quality, heavyweight paper containing 30% post-consumer material. Four black poly corners keep pages flat and the durable backboard ensures you always have a sturdy writing surface to protect your desktop. Page size: 22 in. x 17 in. Overall size: 21.75 in. x 17.12 in. x .06 in.
